Arrow (Armor-Piercing).name: 矢（徹甲弾）
Arrow (Armor-Piercing).description: 防具のSPを-1ポイントでなく-2ポイントする

Arrow (Basic).name: 矢（通常弾）
Arrow (Basic).description: 通常弾、特殊機能は何も無い。

Arrow (Biotoxin).name: 矢（バイオトキシン弾）
Arrow (Biotoxin).description: ダメージを与えない。その代わり命中を受けた生身の者はDV15の〈拷問/薬物判定〉を行わなければならない。これに失敗した者はHPに直接3D6のダメージを受ける。防具を損耗しない

Arrow (Expansive).name: 矢（ダムダム弾）
Arrow (Expansive).description: If you roll Foreign object Critical (see pg. 187), victim rolls for a second (different) Critical Injury. Second injury does not deal bonus damage.

Arrow (Incendiary).name: 矢（焼夷弾）
Arrow (Incendiary).description: If damage dealt to target they are set alight. Target takes 2 damage to HP at end of their turn unless they use action to extinguish flames. Does not stack.

Arrow (Poison).name: 矢（毒弾）
Arrow (Poison).description: No immediate damage. If meat target hit, DV13 Resist Torture/Drugs Check. On a fail 2d6 damage to HP. No Ablation.

Arrow (Rubber).name: 矢（ゴム弾）
Arrow (Rubber).description: Does not cause Critical Injury. Does not ablate armor. Leaves target at minimum 1hp. Counts as Basic ammo for exotic weapons

Arrow (Sleep).name: 矢（睡眠弾）
Arrow (Sleep).description: Deals no damage. If meat target hit DV13 Resist Torture/Drugs. On fail falls Prone (see pg. 169) and unconscious for 1 minute. Can be woken by damage or another person using an action to touch/shake them.

Arrow (Smart).name: 矢（スマート弾）
Arrow (Smart).description: Req Targeting Scope Cyberware, otherwise won't fire. If miss single attack by 4 or less, roll second attack at same DV 1d10+10 (not normal stat). Can add luck. Target can dodge the second roll as normal if able to do so.

Battery Pack.name: バッテリーパック
Battery Pack.description: A rechargeable (1 hour) battery pack, commonly used with Exotic weapons. Contains 8 shots and can be recharged.

Grenade (Armor-Piercing).name: グレネード（徹甲弾）
Grenade (Armor-Piercing).description: 防具のSPを-1ポイントでなく-2ポイントする

Grenade (Biotoxin).name: グレネード（バイオトキシン弾）
Grenade (Biotoxin).description: ダメージを与えない。その代わり命中を受けた生身の者はDV15の〈拷問/薬物判定〉を行わなければならない。これに失敗した者はHPに直接3D6のダメージを受ける。防具を損耗しない

Grenade (EMP).name: グレネード（EMP弾）
Grenade (EMP).description: If hit DV15 Cybertech Check. On Fail 2 pieces of Cyberware or carried electronics (GM's choice) stop working for 1 minute. Cyberlimbs hang loosely like a dismembered meat arm see pg. 187.

Grenade (Flashbang).name: 閃光音響グレネード
Grenade (Flashbang).description: Deals no damage. If hit roll DV15 Resist Torture/Drugs. On a fail take the Damaged Eye and Damaged Ear Critical injuries (see pg. 188) for 1 minute. No Crit damage dealt.

Grenade (Incendiary).name: グレネード（焼夷弾）
Grenade (Incendiary).description: If damage dealt to target they are set alight. Target takes 2 damage to HP at end of their turn unless they use action to extinguish flames. Does not stack.

Grenade (Poison).name: グレネード（毒弾）
Grenade (Poison).description: No immediate damage. If meat target hit, DV13 Resist Torture/Drugs Check. On a fail 2d6 damage to HP. No Ablation.

Grenade (Sleep).name: グレネード（睡眠弾）
Grenade (Sleep).description: Deals no damage. If meat target hit DV13 Resist Torture/Drugs. On fail falls Prone (see pg. 169) and unconscious for 1 minute. Can be woken by damage or another person using an action to touch/shake them.

Grenade (Smoke).name: 発煙グレネード
Grenade (Smoke).description: Deals no Damage. Fills a 10m/yd x 10m/yd with smoke for 1 minute. Tasks obscured by smoke have a -4 penalty.

Grenade (Teargas).name: 催涙ガス・グレネード
Grenade (Teargas).description: Deals no Damage. Hit targets with Meat eyes roll DV13 Resist Torture/Drugs Check. On fail suffer Damaged Eye Critical Injury (See pg. 188) for 1 minute. Does not deal critical bonus damage.

Heavy Pistol (Armor-Piercing).name: 大型拳銃（徹甲弾）
Heavy Pistol (Armor-Piercing).description: 防具のSPを-1ポイントでなく-2ポイントする

Heavy Pistol (Basic).name: 大型拳銃（通常弾）
Heavy Pistol (Basic).description: 通常弾、特殊機能は何も無い。

Heavy Pistol (Expansive).name: 大型拳銃（ダムダム弾）
Heavy Pistol (Expansive).description: If you roll Foreign object Critical (see pg. 187), victim rolls for a second (different) Critical Injury. Second injury does not deal bonus damage.

Heavy Pistol (Smart).description: Req Targeting Scope Cyberware, otherwise won't fire. If miss single attack by 4 or less, roll second attack at same DV 1d10+10 (not normal stat). Can add luck. Target can dodge the second roll as normal if able to do so.

Medium Pistol (Expansive).name: 中型拳銃（ダムダム弾）
Medium Pistol (Expansive).description: If you roll Foreign object Critical (see pg. 187), victim rolls for a second (different) Critical Injury. Second injury does not deal bonus damage.

Medium Pistol (Incendiary).name: 中型拳銃（焼夷弾）

Medium Pistol (Rubber).description: Does not cause Critical Injury. Does not ablate armor. Leaves target at minimum 1hp. Counts as Basic ammo for exotic weapons

Medium Pistol (Smart).name: 中型拳銃（スマート弾）
Medium Pistol (Smart).description: Req Targeting Scope Cyberware, otherwise won't fire. If miss single attack by 4 or less, roll second attack at same DV 1d10+10 (not normal stat). Can add luck. Target can dodge the second roll as normal if able to do so.

Paintball (Acid).name: ペイントボール (酸)
Paintball (Acid).description:
Paintballs filled with acid. Deals no damage but ablates armour by 1 SP on hit*.

*Not currently supported so will need to manually reduce armour on hit

Paintball (Basic).name: ペイントボール（通常）
Paintball (Basic).description: Regular paintballs that don't do any damage. Annoying though.

Rifle (Expansive).name: ライフル（ダムダム弾）
Rifle (Expansive).description: If you roll Foreign object Critical (see pg. 187), victim rolls for a second (different) Critical Injury. Second injury does not deal bonus damage.

Rifle (Incendiary).name: ライフル（焼夷弾）
Rifle (Incendiary).description: If damage dealt to target they are set alight. Target takes 2 damage to HP at end of their turn unless they use action to extinguish flames. Does not stack.

Rifle (Rubber).name: ライフル（ゴム弾）
Rifle (Rubber).description: Does not cause Critical Injury. Does not ablate armor. Leaves target at minimum 1hp. Counts as Basic ammo for exotic weapons

Rocket (Smart).name: ロケット（スマート弾）

Shotgun Shell (Basic).name: ショットガンの散弾（通常弾）

Shotgun Shell (Incendiary).name: ショットガン（焼夷弾）
Shotgun Shell (Incendiary).description: If damage dealt to target they are set alight. Target takes 2 damage to HP at end of their turn unless they use action to extinguish flames. Does not stack.

Shotgun Slug (Armor-Piercing).name: ショットガンのスラッグ弾（徹甲弾）

Shotgun Slug (Basic).name: ショットガンのスラッグ弾（通常弾）

Shotgun Slug (Expansive).name: ショットガンのスラッグ弾（ダムダム弾）

Very Heavy Pistol (Expansive).name: 超大型拳銃（ダムダム弾）
